data.name: Gator Parade
data.detailed_description:
Every year or so a Gator Parade is held.
In which, a noble candidate must solve the problems of the local townspeople in hopes
of becoming the next Gator Mayor.
The only problem is that you slept in and now must trek through the most shady and strange parts of town
in hopes of gathering an army of loyal supporters to help beat a corrupt and greedy opponent



Varried gameplay styles differ from level to level:

  • Stage 1: Unite the woodcutters union, helping the beaver-kind as you defeat river fairing nasties such as enemy submarines and a giant radioactive eel

  • Stage 2: Help a crusty hotel owner rid her basement of rat people in a turn based dungeon crawler

  • Stage 3: Gather a mob of townspeople to do your bidding and storm the debate whilst avoiding dangerous obstacles along the way


More great things:

  • Unique colour scheme with densely detailed environments and themes
  • Cutscenes ahoy! stay up to date with the story so far
  • Replay previous segments and cutscenes along with added unlockable bonuses
  • Easy to pick up and play as a background game, keyboard and mouse supported
  • Frantic, bloodpumping soundtrack

Theme By Adolf Nomura / Thor High heels

data.short_description: Every year or so a Gator Parade is held. In which, a noble candidate must solve the problems of the local townspeople in hopes of becoming the next Gator Mayor. The only problem is that you slept in and now must rush to the big city with a strange collection of friends made along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: The latest version of your graphics card drivers
  • Additional Notes: A HTML5 compatible browser
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers.
